title: How to paint a house
content: You need a big roller, like really big! From there you just wipe it all over the place

title: Startup vs Big Tech
content: Well it really comes down to one major decision. Do you like stability or do you like to gamble?

title: How to find Dogs favorite toy
content: I usually just throw a bunch out there and see which one the little bugger brings back to me

title: Front vs Back end
content: Well if you were ever in a band do you want to be the bass player or the lead guitarist? If you're a bass player I'd go with the back end
